data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: One of the best qualities I see in myself is my kindness to other people around me. I am friendly, generous, and considerate. While some would argue that kindness has a connotation of meaning someone is naive or weak, that is not the case. Being kind often requires courage and strength. Kindness is an interpersonal skill. Kindness is not a relatively common characteristic in today's society, because it usually involves devoting resources to others, rather than being self-interested, which means having more and more for myself. Nonetheless, kindness actually brings lasting well-being for me. I am always active when I see people in need. After being helped, people will appreciate your kindness, show you respect, and probably return the favor later when I need a hand. A sense of community is created when I am being kind to those who need help, and by helping others, I get a sense of fulfillment. （152 字）
data.referenceText: Describe a quality of your personal character that you find important. Is this a common characteristic? How does it help you?
data.referenceTranslate: 描述一个你认为重要的个人品质。这是一个普遍的特征吗?它对你有什么帮助?
